title: Jamie's Story
description: Growing up on a homophobic council estate with an abusive veteran father made Jamie Taylorâ€™s life intolerable. Her only release was feeding her obsession for rich kid Heather Gardner. When the two girls collide, it creates a web of violence and deceit that leads to the tragic death of a friend.The women reunite years later through the eyes of social media and Jamie, now a successful nightclub owner and professional heartbreaker is forced to revisit the past that she spent so long trying to forget. Secrets unfold as rekindled lust leads the way through a damaged trail of family values and misled loyalty.
author: Kim  Harry
